query:
SELECT 
  'clientName' as column_name, COUNT(*) as filled_records FROM crm_clients WHERE clientName IS NOT NULL AND clientName != ''
UNION ALL SELECT 'email', COUNT(*) FROM crm_clients WHERE email IS NOT NULL AND email != ''
UNION ALL SELECT 'phone', COUNT(*) FROM crm_clients WHERE phone IS NOT NULL AND phone != ''
UNION ALL SELECT 'businessType', COUNT(*) FROM crm_clients WHERE businessType IS NOT NULL
UNION ALL SELECT 'status', COUNT(*) FROM crm_clients WHERE status IS NOT NULL
UNION ALL SELECT 'monthlyRetainer', COUNT(*) FROM crm_clients WHERE monthlyRetainer IS NOT NULL
UNION ALL SELECT 'hourlyRate', COUNT(*) FROM crm_clients WHERE hourlyRate IS NOT NULL
UNION ALL SELECT 'startDate', COUNT(*) FROM crm_clients WHERE startDate IS NOT NULL
UNION ALL SELECT 'notes', COUNT(*) FROM crm_clients WHERE notes IS NOT NULL AND notes != '';
